title: NDMA Notification 2025 - Apply Offline for 10 Senior Research Officer Posts
description: The National Disaster Management Authority (NDMA) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 10 Senior Research Officers and Assistant Advisor Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, Post-graduation, and Ph.D. can apply for the NDMA Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the e...
